opinion.posture: Indictment charging defendant with assault with intent to ravish. Before McDONALD, J. Appeal, No. 497, April T., 1970, from judgment of sentence of Court of Common Pleas of Cambria County, Sept. T., 1969, No. C-97. Argued November 8, 1971.
opinion.attorneys: Robert S.Glass, for appellant; Thomas W. Nelson, Assistant District Attorney, with him Ferdinand F. Bionaz, District Attorney, for Commonwealth, appellee.
opinion.opinion_text:
Judgment of sentence affirmed.
SPAULDING, J., absent.Page 764
